Details: 2 AP 2 essence single target ranged spells. Very powerful.
Half of spells must be from school. Skill proficiency.
Pick a drawback to compensate for powerful spells.
Downtime activity: Uncover treasures using academic skill.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Whenever you gain a Resolve, also gain the benefit of the Prepare downtime activity, focusing on the academic skill
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Pick a element / ailment / attack modifying metamagic.
Whenever you complete a rest (other than by spending Resolve) in an area with a danger level of 1 or higher, gain a Resolve.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Downtime activity to replace a spell known or runic alteration selected. Also subclass bonus when you cast a spell.
